title: Group portrait of four women, and man wearing moustache, light colored shirt, two toned necktie with "H" monogram, and dark suit, looking at item in right hand, gathered behind table that reads "Information" in interior with textured glass and posters that read "The Life You Save May Not Always Be Yours. One May Loose His Life Trying To Save Yours", "Stop Consider Value Your Friends...", and "Be Nice To Animals They Are Not As Dumb As You Think They Are They Make Nice Pets, Do Tricks, Save Lives!", possibly in Hill City Municipal Building
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
